abstract: CompUSA, the electronics retailer that has struggled amid pressure from rivals like Best Buy and Wal-Mart, said Friday afternoon that it will be acquired by Gordon Brothers Group, an investment and advisory firm specializing in restructuring. Financial terms were not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: CompUSA, the electronics retailer that has struggled amid pressure from rivals like Best Buy and Wal-Mart, said Friday afternoon that it will be acquired by Gordon Brothers Group, an investment and advisory firm specializing in restructuring. Financial terms were not disclosed.
